title: Rok's Portfolio
description: Welcome to my portfolio! I'm a fullstack developer with a passion for creating beautiful and efficient websites, mods and applications.

page.title: <blue>Fullstack</blue> Developer <blue>creative</blue> and <blue>efficient</blue>!
page.description: Hey, how's it going? My name is <white>Pedro Lucas</white>, but you can call me <white>Rok</white>. I've been programming since 2019, and it's been my passion ever since. I have a total of <blue><waka></waka></blue> of programming under my belt. I'm pursuing a degree in <white>Computer Science</white> at <white>UFES</white>, worked with prominent Brazilian YouTubers, and currently, I'm <white>System Analyst</white> at <blue><job></job></blue>.

my-site.title: My site
my-site.description: My personal website, made with Next JS, Tailwind and Typescript. It's a simple website, but it's a good example of my work.

tag.title: The Arteque Games
tag.description: A minigames championship in Minecraft with 40 influencers. I worked as the team leader and project developer.

theft.title: Theft Mod
theft.description: A mod created for the YouTuber ForeverPlayer's series that adds a system for item theft in Minecraft.

schedule.title: Process Scheduler
schedule.description: Final project for the Operating Systems discipline, at UFES. Made in Java, with the aim of simulating process scheduling in an OS.

soccer.title: Soccer
soccer.description: A super soccer minigame in vanilla Minecraft, using a ball with very dynamic physics and different ways to interact.

planehunt.title: PlaneHunt
planehunt.description: An airplane in vanilla Minecraft, created with the premise of being a minigame of 'hunt' for other players. At the request of Doctor Biscoito.

geleiaphone.title: GPhone
geleiaphone.description: An Iphone made in vanilla Minecraft, with special applications and features, created at the request of YouTuber Geleia.

customportals.title: Custom Portals
customportals.description: Customizable portals in Minecraft, using any block and any size, created at the request of YouTuber Dark.

fallguys.title: Fallguys Craft
fallguys.description: A customizable plugin, inspired by the interactive objects in FallGuys, created at the request of YouTuber Doctor Biscoito.

allayhunt.title: Allay Hunt
allayhunt.description: A reimagining of Minecraft's Allay, with various new abilities and mechanics. At the request of YouTuber Redzin.

golemhunt.title: Golem Hunt
golemhunt.description: A golem in Minecraft with various abilities and mechanics, with the premise of being a 'hunt' minigame. At the request of YouTuber Redzin.

spok.review: Working with Rok was something that made me feel very comfortable and I trusted the work, he was able to solve my problem easily, and best of all was the quick support I had, in a few minutes I already had an answer.

arteque.review: Excellent work and on time, delivered even more than requested, great professional!

onerb.review: Rok is always very professional with my projects. In fact, he always sends me everything about the mods I order, how to use them and even helps with any errors that occur. That's why I always recommend his work.

marco.review: I worked with Rok for a year, a great professional, very dedicated and a great person.
